title: INsmh
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Kim Jong-Un ‘bans North Koreans from eating hot dog soup’
items.description: Anyone caught defying the dictator's decree risks being shipped off to a North Korean labour camp.

items.title: Little-known skin cancer symptom that shows up on toenails
items.description: The warning sign may be mistaken for an injury, experts have warned
